dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile phones emit radio frequency radiation from 800 to 2200 MHz Such radiation is considered to provoke negative reactions in the human body The radiation dose depends mostly on the exposure time i e telephone connection time and technical parameters of the devices Clinical and experimental studies so far have not provided us with a clear statement about the consequences of this radiation on humans
Polski merkuriusz lekarski : organ Polskiego Towarzystwa Lekarskiego
[Activity of vestibular organ in people using mobile phones professionally].
